name: This or That?
description: This or That? is a simple and fun game where players have to choose between two options. It's a great way to get to know people's preferences and start conversations.
equipment: None (or a list of 'this or that' questions)
basicRules: One person asks a 'this or that' question (e.g., 'Cats or dogs?').
Everyone chooses one of the two options.
You can have people physically move to different sides of the room to show their choice, or just have them say their choice out loud.
The game can be played with a set of pre-written questions, or players can make up their own questions.
tips: Keep the questions simple and fun.
Ask follow-up questions to start conversations.
This game can be a good way to find people with similar interests.
